H0.text: Reducing consumption and recycling wastes best demonstrate stewardship.

H1.text: Increasing consumption, discarding wastes are the two behaviors that best demonstrate stewardship.

H2.text: Reducing consumption and discarding wastes are the two behaviors that best demonstrate stewardship.

H3.text: Increasing consumption and recycling wastes are the two behaviors that best demonstrate stewardship.

A4.text: Effective use of resources, and minimization of waste and pollution

A5.text: The reuse and upcycling of product life-cycles so that consumer items are utilized to maximum potential
